remarks: There is a (simple) path of length 2 from one vertex to another vertex in a friendship graph if and only if there is a (simple) path of length 2 from the other vertex back to the first vertex.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Feb-2018.)
statement: frg2woteq $p |- ( ( V FriendGrph E /\ A =/= B ) -> ( ( P e. ( A ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) B ) /\ Q e. ( B ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) A ) ) -> ( ( 1st ` ( 1st ` P ) ) = ( 2nd ` Q ) /\ ( 2nd ` ( 1st ` P ) ) = ( 2nd ` ( 1st ` P ) ) /\ ( 1st ` ( 1st ` Q ) ) = ( 2nd ` P ) ) ) ) $.
